across.question: Large suburb of Paris, on the Seine.
Its meat is got at with a nutcracker.
She danced "Body and Soul" with Clifton Webb.
He won the Pulitzer Prize, 1948, for "Across the Wide Missouri."

down.question: He plays opposite Lana in his first movie.

The important figure in your checkbook.
The highest neon letters in N. Y. C.
Large fish of the tunny family.
He was Secretary of Treasury twelve years, 1801–13.

He'll show you Chinatown, Grant's Tomb, etc.

That scribble on the telephone pad.
